title: Top Stories - App not running in background
custom_preconds:
Given a user has app installed
and is a Lite user
and does not have a Favorite Team Set
and the app is not running in the background
custom_steps:
When the user long presses the app icon
and taps on Top Stories
custom_expected: Then the User is taken to the News index

title: Lite User - No Favorite Team - Top Stories - App backgrounded on Gameday
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on 3D Touch supported device
and has iOS At Bat installed
Must be a Lite User
No Favorite Team Set
User must MAKE SURE app is backgrounded on Gameday
custom_steps:
1. Long Press At Bat icon
2. Tap on Top Stories
